questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Insects on a concrete surface
D) Urban architecture

Where was the photo likely taken?  
A) In a forest  
B) On a beach  
C) On a sidewalk or concrete surface  
D) In a garden

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A busy street
B) A resting/ died insect
C) A family gathering
D) A sports event

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A bird
C) An insect
D) A tree

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A bird
C) An insect
D) A tree

What type of insect is in the photo?
A) Butterfly
B) Bee
C) Wasp
D) Ant

What is the condition of the insect?
A) Flying
B) Dead or resting on the ground
C) On a flower
D) In water

What is the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A beach
C) A concrete surface and small pebbles
D) A garden

What is the foreground of the photo?
A) A bird
B) A flower
C) An insect
D) A tree

What color is the insect?
A) Green
B) Yellow
C) Red-brown
D) Blue

What is the texture of the surface the insect is on?
A) Smooth
B) Sandy
C) Rough and grainy
D) Watery

What is not visible in the photo?
A) Trees
B) Flowers
C) People
D) All of the above

What is the insect's position in the photo?
A) Upright
B) On its side
C) Upside down
D) Flying

What is the color of the surface the insect is on?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Gray
D) Brown

What is the insect's orientation in relation to the surface?
A) Parallel
B) Perpendicular
C) Diagonal
D) Horizontal

What is the insect's apparent activity?
A) Flying
B) Crawling
C) Resting or dead
D) Feeding

What is the insect's size relative to the surface?
A) Very large
B) Very small
C) Medium-sized
D) Indeterminate

How many legs of the insect are visible?
A) Two
B) Four
C) Six
D) Eight

What is the insect's head orientation?
A) Facing up
B) Facing down
C) Facing left
D) Facing right

What other elements are present on the surface?
A) Water droplets
B) Leaves
C) Small pebbles
D) Grass

What is not present in the photo?
A) Trees
B) Water
C) Flowers
D) All of the above

What is the shadow direction of the insect?
A) To the left
B) To the right
C) Upwards
D) Downwards

What is the primary color of the photo?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Gray
D) Yellow

What is the insect's wing position?
A) Spread out
B) Folded back
C) Missing
D) Fluttering

What is the insect's body segmentation?
A) One segment
B) Two segments
C) Three segments
D) Four segments

What is the surface condition?
A) Wet
B) Dry
C) Muddy
D) Icy

What is the insect's body shape?  
A) Round  
B) Elongated  
C) Flat  
D) Square

What is the insect's leg position?
A) Spread out
B) Tucked in
C) Missing
D) Bent

What is the surface material?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Concrete/ Gravel
D) Plastic

What is the insect's head shape?
A) Round/ Oval
B) Pointed
C) Flat
D) Square

What is the insect's thorax color?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Red-brown
D) Yellow

What is the insect's wing texture?
A) Smooth
B) Fuzzy
C) Scaly
D) Feathery

What is the insect's leg color?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Red-brown
D) Yellow

What is the relationship between the elements in the photo?  
A) The wasp is sitting on a flower  
B) The wasp is flying above the ground  
C) The wasp is on a concrete surface  
D) The wasp is inside a nest

What color is the wasp?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Red
D) Brown

What texture is the surface the wasp is on?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Wet
D) Soft

What is the position of the wasp in the photo?
A) Lying on its side on the ground
B) Flying in the air
C) Crawling on the ground
D) Sitting on a flower

What can be inferred about the state of the wasp?
A) It is alive and active
B) It is dead or motionless
C) It is feeding
D) It is building a nest
